name: Wood Blast
description:
Wood Blast is a super addicting cubes game filled with fun and surprises! Join the amazing journey today and get ready to crush and explode all the colorful bricks. Play and discover tons of great puzzles and challenging quests that will test and color-matching skills.

It’s easy just to pick up and play!

Can’t get enough of free puzzles? Download and enjoy the most relaxing game where you have to smash tiles, collect wooden toys and clear the board.

Enjoy this FUN puzzle game!

* Match cubes of the same color to pop
* Collect cubes to win
* Reach the level target and complete the challenges
* Clear the board and win awesome rewards
* Create powerful combos and crash your way to victory!
* Play for free online or offline


Wood Blast Special Features:

* Thousands of fun levels filled with unique puzzles and challenges
* Amazing graphics and colorful wood cubes.
* Powerful boosts that will help you crash the blocks
* Addictive and easy game to play with family and friends

Use stunning boosters & start blasting cubes:

* A Saw booster will boost your game and clear a specific cube from the board
* Tap incredible Arrow booster to explode a single line of cubes
* Master all challenges with an amazing Hammer booster to pop a single cube

These amazing boosters will help you pop all the colorful blocks and pass levels!


Can tapping two or more cubes get even more fun?
Play now the best block puzzle game and discover the wood pop fun!


With so many enjoyable levels, unique puzzles and boosters, Wood Blast is a must-have cubes game for your device!
